title: False representation? Really Riot?
body:
I'm not even afraid of calling you scumbags on this one.

The Forsaken Jayce promo clearly shows that his acceleration gate is RED when in fact for YOU it appears blue.

You are purposefully not showing what the actual product looks like in game. This is nothing short of disgusting.

replies.body:
Hey ya'll,

Just wanted to own up to this one. When we were capturing the images to be used for the comic it switched Jayce to the enemy team, hence the red gate, and we didn't catch it until now. We've already recaptured the image to show a blue gate and it'll be updated soon.

Sorry again for any confusion this may have caused but thank you for letting us know.

Cheers!

Riot name without being red with fistbump logo.

****
Well if Katey says you're legit Larry, then that's good enough for me.  Unless it's all part of one huge conspiracy...

Calm yourself o.o it's another one of those, ours is blue, the enemy's is red thing.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QhRJyy5J-fA
Like I said, the one YOU see is blue, but on the teaser it's red. They are not accurately representing the product.
Who really cares it's not that important, the skin still looks the same and is still awesome.  Anyway if your so picky then just refund it.

I actually didn't buy it.

Oh and I really cannot figure out how people think this is acceptable, but ok, accept being lied to.
I wish the gate was red.
